title.rendered: Fixed Ops Digital at Digital Dealer Conference & Expo

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1621443685269{background-color: #00a79d !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621443824053{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]

Register Today and Get $100 Off Your Pass

Whether in Tampa or from the comfort of your home, we hope you’ll take part in this year’s Digital Dealer Conference & Expo. Click here to join Fixed Ops Digital in Tampa and use the code RFEXH57 to save $100 on your pass. Remember to come and visit us at booth #615![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][image_with_animation image_url=”7731″ alignment=”center” animation=”Fade In” img_link_target=”_blank” hover_animation=”none” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”medium_depth” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.digitaldealer.com/tampa/session-schedule-tampa/”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”15″][vc_column_text]

Creating a Better Website Experience for Your Service Customers

Wednesday, June 9, 2021
1:30 PM to 2:20 PM
Room 20
In-Person
[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” animate=”yes” custom_height=”15″][vc_column_text]In this session, you will learn how to:

  1. Implement a comprehensive service specials strategy on your website that will increase appointments and drive greater results.
  2. Establish your dealership as the online authority in your market through an integrated website content strategy.
  3. Create an effective service shopping funnel on your website similar to what has worked with new and used vehicle sales.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][image_with_animation image_url=”7732″ alignment=”center” animation=”Fade In” img_link_target=”_blank” hover_animation=”none” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”medium_depth” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.digitaldealer.com/tampa/session-schedule-tampa/”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”15″][vc_column_text]

The Myths, Lies, and Truths About Marketing Your Fixed Ops Department Online

Thursday, June 10, 2021
11:00 AM to 11:50 AM
Room 18
In-Person
[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” animate=”yes” custom_height=”15″][vc_column_text]In this session, you will learn how to:

Coming soon![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]You know your dealership should improve its website and digital presence, but where do you start? The Digital Dealer Conference & Expo is a great resource for dealerships and is taking place in Tampa, FL from June 8th-10th, 2021. Come see Fixed Ops Digital at booth #615 and say hi! Fixed Ops Digital is the industry leader, setting the standard for what dealerships NEED to be doing online for their fixed operations department. Check out our award-winning Drive Service Solution.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation image_url=”7723″ alignment=”center” animation=”Fade In” img_link_target=”_blank” hover_animation=”none” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.digitaldealer.com/tampa/register/?utm_source=feathr&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=registration&utm_content=&utm_term=”][vc_column_text]

Why Attend Digital Dealer?

Why does your dealership need to focus on digital efforts? Over the past year, consumers have started to become more tech-savvy. Whether this is by using QR codes to see restaurant menus, learning to mute themselves in a zoom call, or ordering delivery food more frequently, it’s undeniable that people’s lives have shifted to be more digital. This is true for dealerships as well. Customers are more likely to engage with a dealership online before coming in to buy a car or for service, and 62% of consumers are more likely to complete the entire buying process online (Kelley Blue Book). As COVID declines and more consumers return to the dealerships, it’s more important than ever that dealerships can meet these customers where they’re at – in the digital space.

Digital Dealer can show you exactly how to bring your dealership’s digital presence to the next level with three days of networking opportunities, expert presentations, and vendor displays (including Fixed Ops Digital!). This year’s conference will be held in person, but will also have a virtual aspect for those unable to attend.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
